contexts.context: Galsiah brought out the map of the guildhouse, freshly <mark>stolen</mark>, and they began to detail out the strategy.
...the three had met, formulated a plan, bought or <mark>stolen</mark> the necessary ingredients, and were about to execute it. Not...
...obvious signs of Necromancy such as hastily emptied graves or ash <mark>stolen</mark> from one of their ashpits, a careful and discrete Necromancer...
